quickstart_prompt.description: Build a working movie search app with natural language queries, vector search, and RAG in 5 steps.
quickstart_prompt.short: The prompt will guide you to create a movie search demo application that uses natural language queries, vector and hybrid search to browse a movie collection.
features: Create a Movie collection with text2vec-weaviate vectorizer
Import 5 sample movies (The Matrix, Inception, The Godfather, Spirited Away, The Dark Knight)
Use the query agent to retrieve information with natural language queries (only Python & TypeScript)
Implement vector, hybrid, and keyword search modes
Add Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with Anthropic for AI-powered movie explanations
